availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William "Horace" Sandford (Owenton, Kentucky, sheriff and circuit court clerk)

body.p: Owenton, Kentucky, sheriff and clerk. Virginia native. Married to Mary E. Branham Sandford in Gallatin County, Kentucky, on January 1, 1847. Father of Alfred B. Sandford and Joseph B. Sandford. Married to Fannie B. Sandford. Father of William H. Sandford. Sheriff in Owen County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Owen County in 1850. Clerk of the Owen Circuit Court from 1859 to 1866.
